detailedRequirements:
OVERVIEW
The goal of this First2Finish contest is easy - fix two bugs, and deliver two slightly different versions of the code base. Here are the requirements:
1. Fix two defects.
2. Ensure that the app functions in the latest version of iOS (7.1).
3. Deliver the code in two different versions: 1 with test data ( you do not need to generate this, it's already included) and 1 without test data. 

DEFECTS
1. App Crashing in Food Summary 
----1. Login
----2. Make sure you have food logged in Food Summary (screen you see right after logging in)
----3. In the "Nutrient Info" column, slide along the icons for kcal, mg, liter to expose the 2nd of icons for Protein, Carbohydrates, Fat.
----4. Slide one more time after the icons for Protein, Carbohydrates, Fat.
----5. ERROR: App will crash.
2. App Not Adding Food in Food Inventory

Login
----1. Click on the Food Inventory icon
----2. Check checkboxes for multiple foods.
----3. Click "Add to consumption" button
----4. ERROR: Clicking on "Add to consumption" does nothing. Clicking on "Cancel" does nothing either.

CODE DELIVERY
After the two fixes above are done, we will need the code base returned in two versions (two different zip files):
----Version 1 - Includes the fixes above, no other changes to the code. App will sync normally with Samba Server for test data. 
----Version 2 - Includes the fixes above , but this version should have the test data loaded into the iOS app as the app is compiled and built, vs Version 1 which pulls the test data from the Samba Server. Also, the friendly error when you load the app and no Samba Server is available "We are unable to sync this iPad with the central..." should no longer appear (this version will be for testing the app without a Samba server).
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
RESOURCES
----Source Code - attached.
----ISS_FIT_Data_Sync_092613.docx:  attached - explains how the data sync process has been updated during testing and is different than the original design in the module architecture (this is the most recent description of how data sync works in the current code).
----Sync Lock and Data Update Services Deployment Guide.docx: attached - deployment guide on how to setup Samba locally.

WINNER SELECTION
The winning submission will be selected as long as they complete the requirements above without introducing any additional defects.
